actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals an additional income tax exemption for each dependent under the age of 19 who is disabled.

summary.text: Allows individuals an additional income tax exemption of $750 under the Internal Revenue Code for each dependent under the age of 19 who is disabled.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals an additional income tax exemption for each dependent under the age of 19 who is disabled.
